abstract: Sidney Rodrigue Noukpo Govou (French pronunciation: ​[sidnɛ ɡɔvu]) (born 27 July 1979) is a French international footballer of Beninese descent, currently playing for Monts d'Or Azergues Foot in the Championnat de France amateur. Govou is a natural winger but occasionally plays as a striker.
